name: Chosen One
description: A character destined for greatness, often with a unique power or lineage.

name: Reluctant Hero
description: Someone forced into heroism despite their initial hesitation.

name: Antihero
description: A protagonist with questionable morals or unconventional methods.

name: Mentor
description: A wise figure who guides the hero, often older and experienced.

name: Comic Relief
description: Provides humor to lighten the story's tone.

name: Femme Fatale
description: A seductive and mysterious woman who leads others into danger.

name: Brooding Loner
description: A solitary character, often with a tragic past.

name: Ingenue
description: A naive and innocent character, often young.

name: Evil Overlord
description: A powerful antagonist with ambitions of domination.

name: Lovable Rogue
description: A charming, morally ambiguous character with a heart of gold.

name: Sidekick
description: A loyal companion who supports the hero.

name: Mad Scientist
description: An eccentric genius with dangerous experiments.

name: Tragic Hero
description: A noble character doomed by a fatal flaw.

name: Everyman
description: A relatable, ordinary character thrust into extraordinary situations.

name: Jaded Veteran
description: A battle-weary character who’s seen too much.

name: Noble Savage
description: A character untarnished by civilization, with a pure moral compass.

name: Damsel in Distress
description: A character needing rescue, traditionally a woman.

name: Byronic Hero
description: Dark, charismatic, and deeply flawed.

name: Eternal Optimist
description: Always positive, no matter how dire the situation.

name: Cynical Realist
description: A pragmatist who often clashes with idealists.

name: Underdog
description: Overcomes great odds despite being underestimated.

name: Class Clown
description: Makes jokes to hide insecurities or defuse tension.

name: Villain with a Heart
description: An antagonist with redeeming qualities.

name: Warrior Poet
description: Combines physical prowess with intellectual depth.

name: Rebel Leader
description: Fights against oppressive systems or regimes.

name: Protective Parent
description: Driven by love for their child.

name: Scheming Manipulator
description: A master of deception and plotting.

name: Innocent Child
description: A beacon of purity and hope.

name: Loyal Butler
description: A steadfast servant with hidden wisdom or skills.

name: Brash Rookie
description: Overconfident but inexperienced.

name: Overbearing Boss
description: Demanding, often humorous authority figure.

name: Cowardly Lion
description: Afraid of danger but capable of bravery.

name: Tortured Artist
description: Fueled by inner turmoil to create masterpieces.

name: Golden Boy/Girl
description: Excels at everything and loved by all.

name: Seductive Villain
description: Uses allure to achieve nefarious goals.

name: Tech Genius
description: Solves problems with technological savvy.

name: Wild Card
description: Unpredictable, with motives and actions that keep everyone guessing.

name: Crusader
description: Fights tirelessly for a cause they believe in.

name: Reformed Criminal
description: A former villain seeking redemption.

name: Eccentric Millionaire
description: Wealthy and unconventional.

name: Trickster
description: Loves causing chaos, often to teach lessons or reveal truths.

name: Dutiful Soldier
description: Obeys orders and adheres to strict codes of conduct.

name: Gentle Giant
description: Big and intimidating, but kind and tender-hearted.

name: Outcast
description: Shunned by society but finds strength in their uniqueness.

name: Vengeful Spirit
description: Motivated by revenge for a wrong done to them.

name: Obsessive Detective
description: Relentless in pursuit of justice or the truth.

name: Happy-Go-Lucky Adventurer
description: Lives for the thrill of the journey.

name: Schemer
description: Always plotting, often for personal gain.

name: Mentor Turned Villain
description: A guide who becomes corrupted or misguided.

name: Hot-Headed Fighter
description: Quick to anger and action, often impulsive.

name: Reluctant Royal
description: A noble figure who doesn't want their throne.

name: Blind Seer
description: A character who lacks sight but sees beyond the physical world.

name: Tragic Lover
description: Doomed to heartbreak or loss in romance.

name: Stoic Warrior
description: Emotionally reserved but incredibly dependable.

name: Carefree Drifter
description: A wanderer with no ties, living in the moment.

name: Quirky Neighbor
description: An odd but endearing presence in the protagonist’s life.

name: Social Climber
description: Obsessed with status and willing to do anything to achieve it.

name: Devout Believer
description: Motivated by faith or ideology.

name: Unscrupulous Businessperson
description: Greedy and willing to cross any line for profit.

name: Quiet Genius
description: Underestimated due to their reserved nature.

name: Battle-Hardened Leader
description: Commands respect through their experience.

name: Overconfident Rookie
description: Bold but often naive.

name: Misunderstood Monster
description: Feared due to appearance or abilities, but kind at heart.

name: Cunning Survivor
description: Does whatever it takes to stay alive.

name: Romantic Dreamer
description: Longs for love and beauty in the world.

name: Charismatic Cult Leader
description: Inspires fanatic devotion.

name: Hardboiled Detective
description: Cynical, street-smart investigator.

name: Nurturing Healer
description: Devoted to caring for others.

name: Visionary Inventor
description: Dreams big, often ahead of their time.

name: Reserved Scholar
description: A thinker, not a fighter.

name: Vain Narcissist
description: Obsessed with their own appearance and status.

name: Elder Statesman
description: Wise, respected, and often a peacemaker.

name: Bumbling Fool
description: Always making mistakes but with a good heart.

name: Sarcastic Snarker
description: Quick-witted with biting humor.

name: Heroic Sacrifice
description: Gives their life for the greater good.

name: Idealistic Youth
description: Sees the world as it could be, not as it is.

name: Calculating Strategist
description: Always thinking several steps ahead.

name: Paranoid Conspiracy Theorist
description: Sees hidden plots everywhere.

name: Strong Silent Type
description: Speaks little but acts decisively.

name: Hopeless Romantic
description: Constantly seeking love, often to their detriment.

name: Manipulative Politician
description: Skilled at bending people to their will.

name: Dark Messiah
description: A savior figure with questionable methods or morals.

name: Wild Child
description: Untamed, free-spirited, and unpredictable.

name: Unassuming Hero
description: An ordinary person who rises to extraordinary circumstances.

name: Sinister Butler
description: A servant with hidden motives or a dark past.

name: Thrill-Seeking Daredevil
description: Lives for danger and excitement.

name: Starry-Eyed Prodigy
description: Talented and ambitious but inexperienced.

name: Bitter Rival
description: Obsessed with outdoing or defeating the protagonist.

name: Lost Soul
description: Searching for meaning, often plagued by inner demons.

name: Peaceful Pacifist
description: Avoids violence at all costs.

name: Obsessed Fan
description: Takes admiration to dangerous extremes.

name: Manipulative Lover
description: Uses romance as a tool for control.

name: Guardian Angel
description: Protects others, often at great personal cost.

name: Absent-Minded Professor
description: Brilliant but scatterbrained.

name: Beast Within
description: Struggles to control a literal or metaphorical monster inside.

name: Charmer
description: Wins others over with wit and charisma.

name: Wise Elder
description: A sage figure, often dispensing advice in riddles.

name: Dreamer
description: Lives in their imagination, often disconnected from reality.

name: No Trope
description: A character that doesn't align with any of the tropes above or not enough information.
